fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY Parallel CAD Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY Parallel CAD] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression [Delta Down All CCY Parallel CAD]*[Date Sign] to DAX by replacing Tableau field references with the 'TableName'[Column] format and preserving the multiplication operation; returned as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced calculated field 'Date Sign' includes logic that depends on Tableau parameters (e.g. [Parameters].[Use Custom Date], [Parameters].[End Date], [Parameters].[Start Date]). Per the rules, any calculation depending on parameters must be a measure.
